tag_list: evoda-group, social-media, entrepreneur, business-owner, creative-director, online-branding
overview: Michael is an avid Entrepreneur with a lifelong passion for business, he first showed interest in business at the young age of 14 and has never looked back. Michael has always believed in several core values around understanding, quality, and experience. He’s launched several companies in the Spa, Fitness, and consulting industries. He’s passionate about Small Business success and always looking for the next opportunity. His latest venture Evoda Group is an Online branding firm that empowers Small Business owners with tools for success.
